metadata.title: USN-5225-1 -- lxml vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that lxml incorrectly handled certain XML and HTML files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5225-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-lxml - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.4+esm2 python-lxml - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.4+esm2 python-lxml-doc - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.4+esm2 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
